languages.text: "Жалость? Насколько же я пал в твоих глазах, если дело дошло до такого".
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."
languages.original_text: "Жалость? Насколько же я пал в твоих глазах, если дело дошло до такого".

traits.locale_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this?"
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this?"
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."
"Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

languages.text: 「同情か？もしそうなら、お前の目には俺がどれほど堕ちてしまったかがわかるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: 「同情か？もしそうなら、お前の目には俺がどれほど堕ちてしまったかがわかるだろう」

languages.text: "Ist das Mitleid? Wie weit muss ich in Euren Augen gesunken sein, dass es so weit gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das Mitleid? Wie weit muss ich in Euren Augen gesunken sein, dass es so weit gekommen ist."

languages.text: « Serait-ce de la pitié que je perçois dans votre ton ? Je dois vraiment être tombé bien bas à vos yeux pour mériter un tel traitement. »
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: « Serait-ce de la pitié que je perçois dans votre ton ? Je dois vraiment être tombé bien bas à vos yeux pour mériter un tel traitement. »

languages.text: «¿Es eso piedad? He debido de caer muy bajo a sus ojos si hemos llegado a esto».
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es eso piedad? He debido de caer muy bajo a sus ojos si hemos llegado a esto».

languages.text: “你是在可怜我吗？在你看来，我恐怕已经萎靡不振了吧。”
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: “你是在可怜我吗？在你看来，我恐怕已经萎靡不振了吧。”

languages.text: "Bana acıyor musun? Buraya kadar geldiysek gözünden fazlasıyla düşmüşüm demektir."
languages.original_text: "Is this pity? How far I must have fallen in your eyes if it has come to this."

traits.locale_text: "Bana acıyor musun? Buraya kadar geldiysek gözünden fazlasıyla düşmüşüm demektir."
